Name: cement production, CEM II/B | waste mixed aggregates, from demolition | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: In this dataset, the production of CEM II/B is described, where clinker (69.9%) is ground together with gypsum (3.89%) and mixed with limestone (15.3%), hard coal ash, burnt shale, waste mixed aggregates (from demolition), blast furnace slag and ground granulated blast furnace slag (GGBFS). The activity includes also the input of electricity used for the grinding of the clinker and grinding aids (ethylene glycol and iron sulfate).
